attributes.action: Build a statue/memorial to Mo Mowlam in Westminster Palace
attributes.additional_details: That a statue or any other suitable tribute be built in memory of Mo Mowlam in the Houses of Parliament in order to celebrate the remarkable achievements of a life too short. To commemorate her part in the Northern Ireland Peace Process, a truly historic event and to mark the fact that she was the 'people's politician'. She is held dear to the hearts of many and for somebody so remarkable it is only right that she is remembered and celebrated properly.
